1355930.name: Escape the Clinic
1355930.description:
Waking up trapped in his office, a doctor must find a way out of his own place of work.
A mysterious woman awaits outside. Malevolence waits inside.
"Escape the Clinic" is a first person puzzle horror game, where the player has to find clues, keys, and passwords to find a way out of the building.
It should be treated like a large escape room - albeit one with mysterious spirits about.
1355930.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
